content: 1 round purl 1 round for the next 9 row you will have 7 garter ridges on the right side of the toy round 23 k2tog k14 ssk x 2 32sts round 24 purl all sts you will have 8 garter ridges on the right side of the toy rounds 25 27 change to flesh tone for the face at the beginning of row 25 then knit all sts for 3 rounds round 28 k5 p1 k4 p1 k to end of round rounds 29 30 knit all sts for 2 rounds round 31 change to hat colour and knit all sts round 32 purl all sts round 33 knit all sts round 34 *k2 p2* around © 2021 hazel wadeson for nuthanger knits 7 round 35 knit all sts round 36 *k2 p2* around round 37 knit all sts round 38 purl all sts round 39 k6 k2tog x 4 28 sts round 40 knit all sts round 41 k5 k2tog x 4 24 sts round 42 knit all sts round 43 k4 k2tog x 4 20 sts round 44 knit all sts round 45 k3 k2tog x 4 16 sts round 46 knit all sts round 47 k2 k2tog x 4 12 sts round 48 knit all sts round 49 k1 k2tog x 4 8 sts round 50 k2tog x 4 4 sts break yarn thread through remaining sts and draw up pull end through top of hat and to inside of toy to fasten_off finishing insert safety eyes above the purl marking stitches you made on round 28 stuff the toy firmly but so there is still some give and the toy is not completely solid i usually leave the ends of yarn left from the colour changes as part of the stuffing use the end leftover from casting on to sew up the bottom seam from one side to the other thread the end back through the toy to finish © 2021 hazel wadeson for nuthanger knits
